Headline: #71 71st/South Shore Temporary Northbound Reroute near Commercial/92nd
ShortDescription: Northbound 71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted via Commercial, 92nd, Houston, 91st and Commercial: due to, street blockage near Commercial/92nd.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted via Commercial, 92nd, Houston, 91st and Commercial: due to, street blockage near Commercial/92nd.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Howard-bound Red Line Service Delayed at Loyola
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Red Line trains are standing at Loyola due to sick customer. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Red Line trains are standing at Loyola due to sick customer.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
